name: get-sessions-sessionId
description: Returns the status of the payment session with the `sessionId` and `sessionResult` specified in the path.

sessionId.description: A unique identifier of the session.

sessionResult.description: The `sessionResult` value from the Drop-in or Component.

$ul: **id**: A unique identifier of the session.
**status**: The status of the session. The status included in the response doesn't get updated. Don't make the request again to check for payment status updates.
